<h1 align="center">CODEX</h1>

### This application is designed like the environment of [Chat-GPT](https://chat.openai.com/chat)

## This is a single page application to chat with the bot and get real time answers

## The answers we get from the bot are completely generated by AI model from the Chat-GPT page

### I tried to make it as much responsive as possible. Please forgive me for any mistakes.

## Site is live at : https://codex-gpt.netlify.app/
## Deployed using (frontend) : [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/)
## Deployed using (server side) : [Render](https://render.com/)


## Build Using : 
- [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/)
- [Open AI Api](https://openai.com/api/)
- [Express](https://expressjs.com/)
- [CORS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CORS)
- [DotENV](https://www.npmjs.com/package/dotenv)
- [Nodemon](https://nodemon.io/)
